channel.title: Java error trying to start server
channel.description:
I get this error when I try to run a pimpscape server 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
this is my compile.bat @echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
and this is my runserver.bat @echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause
I had it running b4 on XP but had to roast my hard drive, now I can't seem to get the server running again. I d/l the latest java and edited the command lines in path and classpath like before but now I get an error.

item.title: Java error trying to start server
item.dc:creator: @Blooper Blooper
item.description:
@Blooper wrote:

I did that and STILL have the same error… grrrrrr

do I need to edit the compile.bat too?

this is the command line
@echo off
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6._01\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

this is the error…
‘java’ is not recognized as an int
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .[br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 09:59:46 AM[/size][hr]GOT IT!

Thanks guys!

I had to change the path everywhere

Read full topic
item.source: Java error trying to start server

item.title: Java error trying to start server
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

change

java=“C:\Program Files\Java[b]jdk1.6.0[/b]\bin\java.exe”

into

java=“C:\Program Files\Java[b]jdk1.6_01[/b]\bin\java.exe”

since you got update 1

Read full topic

good or bad?
this is the file name we d/l jdk-6u1-windows-i586-p.exe

thanks

item.title: Java error trying to start server
item.dc:creator: @Blooper Blooper
item.description:
@Blooper wrote:

I get this error when I try to run a pimpscape server
‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

this is my compile.bat
@echo off
title Compiler
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

and this is my runserver.bat
@echo off
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

I had it running b4 on XP but had to roast my hard drive, now I can’t seem to get the server running again.
I d/l the latest java and edited the command lines in path and classpath like before but now I get an error.
